00069 #define Apoxi_Unzip_hpp
00073 
00074 /* define the constants and status information */
00075 #define UNZ_OK                   (0)
00076 #define UNZ_END_OF_LIST_OF_FILE  (-100)
00077 #define UNZ_ERRNO                (Z_ERRNO)
00078 #define UNZ_EOF                  (0)
00079 #define UNZ_PARAMERROR           (-102)
00080 #define UNZ_BADZIPFILE           (-103)
00081 #define UNZ_INTERNALERROR        (-104)
00082 #define UNZ_CRCERROR             (-105)
00083 
00084 
00085 #define BUFREADCOMMENT (0x400)
00086 #define SIZECENTRALDIRITEM (0x2e)
00087 #define SIZEZIPLOCALHEADER (0x1e)
00088 
00089 #define UNZ_MAXFILENAMEINZIP (256)
00090 #define APOXI_UNZIP_BUFSIZE (256)

00092 /* define max and min values for Apoxi data types for save casts */
00093 #define MAX_UINT16 65535
00094 
00095 
00096 typedef struct JarFileGlobalInfo_s
00097 {
00098     UINT16 number_entry;         /* total number of entries in
00099                                     the central dir on this disk */
00100     UINT16 size_comment;         /* size of the global comment of the zipfile */
00101 } JarFileGlobalInfo;
00102 
00103 typedef struct FileInfo_s
00104 {
00105     UINT16 version;              /* version made by                 2 bytes */
00106     UINT16 version_needed;       /* version needed to extract       2 bytes */
00107     UINT16 flag;                 /* general purpose bit flag        2 bytes */
00108     UINT16 compression_method;   /* compression method              2 bytes */
00109     UINT32 dosDate;              /* last mod file date in Dos fmt   4 bytes */
00110     UINT32 crc;                  /* crc-32                          4 bytes */
00111     UINT16 compressed_size;      /* compressed size                 2 bytes */ 
00112     UINT16 uncompressed_size;    /* uncompressed size               2 bytes */ 
00113     UINT16 size_filename;        /* filename length                 2 bytes */
00114     UINT16 size_file_extra;      /* extra field length              2 bytes */
00115     UINT16 size_file_comment;    /* file comment length             2 bytes */
00116 
00117     UINT16 disk_num_start;       /* disk number start               2 bytes */
00118     UINT16 internal_fa;          /* internal file attributes        2 bytes */
00119     UINT32 external_fa;          /* external file attributes        4 bytes */
00120 } FileInfo;
00121 
00122 
00123 
00124 /* unz_s contain internal information about the zipfile
00125 */
00126 typedef struct FileInfoInternal_s
00127 {
00128     UINT32 offset_curfile;/* relative offset of local header 4 bytes */
00129 } FileInfoInternal;
